mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER_DETAIL WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT GROUP_CODE FROM USER_GROUP WHERE SEQ = #{groupCode}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOT FROM USER_DETAIL UD WHERE UD.DEL_DATE IS NULL
AND UD.USER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWord},'%')
AND UD.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWord},'%')
AND UD.GROUP_CODE = #{groupCode}

SELECT UD.SEQ ,UD.GROUP_CODE ,(SELECT REG_DESC FROM USER_GROUP WHERE GROUP_CODE = UD.GROUP_CODE) AS GROUP_NM ,UD.NAME ,UD.USER_ID ,UD.DEPARTMENT ,UD.VALIDATE_DATE ,SUBSTRING(UD.VALIDATE_DATE,1,4) AS VALIDATE_DATE_YEAR ,SUBSTRING(UD.VALIDATE_DATE,6,2) AS VALIDATE_DATE_MONTH ,SUBSTRING(UD.VALIDATE_DATE,9,2) AS VALIDATE_DATE_DAY ,UD.REG_DESC FROM USER_DETAIL UD WHERE UD.DEL_DATE IS NULL AND UD.USER_ID = #{userId} AND UD.SEQ = #{seq}
